laboratory_examinations.findings: 8.4 mg/dL, which is within the normal range of 8.4 - 10.3 mg/dL.

findings.liver: Diffusely echogenic with smooth contour, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein, no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 5 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Mildly distended with multiple gallstones, markedly thickened wall measuring up to 1.2 cm, minimal associated hyperemia, no pericholecystic fluid, positive sonographic Murphy's sign.
findings.pancreas: Within normal limits without masses or ductal dilation.
findings.kidneys: Limited views show normal echogenicity and differentiation, no masses, stones or hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
